Package edu.cwru.sepia.action

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    The primary class of issued commands.
    ActionQueue
    A data class that stores an action and the proposed subactions to acheive that Required because the full
    ActionResult
    An immutable (so long as Action is) result giving feedback on a specific action.
    DirectedAction
    A subtype of Action, include PrimitiveMove, PrimitiveGather, PrimitiveDeposit
    LocatedAction
    A subtype of Action, includes CompoundMove
    LocatedProductionAction
    A subtype of Action, includes CompoundBuild
    ProductionAction
    A subtype of Action, includes CompoundProduction, PrimitiveProduction, PrimitiveBuild
    TargetedAction
    A subtype of Action, include CompoundAttack, PrimitiveAttack, CompoundGather, CompoundDeposit
